text:
When u see the chef exit the toilet cubicle not washing hand while continue to scratch his ear and back side and drag his feet into din tai Fung back kitchen while play with his mobile phone. U lose all taste and trust in the brand despite them having a glassed kitchen. The back kitchen is not visible to you and thatâ€™s where all the other food poisoning is occurring. Wonâ€™t be surprise to see them on news due to food poisoning soon with such poor hygiene standards chefs

We decided to cancel our orders and went Tim ho wan instead

The restaurant excels in its delicate and flavorful xiao long bao, which is a must-try for any visitor. The precise balance of thin dumpling skin, savory filling, and rich broth exemplifies the mastery of their chefs. Additionally, the clean and modern ambience, combined with efficient and friendly staff, enhances the overall dining experience. While there might be a wait during peak hours, the experience is well worth it for the delectable Taiwanese cuisine.

Fast serving service!
XiaoLongBao was okâ€¦ just normal taste
Love the crispy golden prawn pancake ðŸ§¡ you can taste the prawn in every single bite.
Noodle came with less condiments and meats. Totally not worth it
Fried rice was good
So far the foods were just ok.

Very friendly and attentive staff. All the foods are flavorful and taste good. Just that the fried rice can be a bit oily. Xiao long bao soup is a lot lesser as compare to the previously time when I had it.

Quality food, good service & pleasant atmosphere are reason why this Michelin star famous restaurant always has a long queue of customers at its many outlets. This Punggol outlet did not disappoint.

FOOD
+ Many of its dishes are great. But the Xiao Long Bao is simply a must order. A crust well made enough that it doesn't tear or break easily and at the same time thin enough to allow you to savour the soup within the dumpling
+ Spicy oil dumplings had a great flavour of chilli & vinegar that is not too oily too.

SERVICE
Interestingly, they augmented their service with a robot that brings you to your table. The good service that you come to expect from all of its outlets is still there though

ATMOSPHERE
Pleasant & clean. Ding Tai Feng outlets all have this vibe that makes you feel comfortable
